 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּ֫קֶף‎</span> **noun masculine** ==power, strength, energy== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּקוֺף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּקֶף‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> absolute [[Esth.9.29|Esth 9:29]] construct [[Dan.11.17|Dan 11:17]], ***the strength of his whole kingdom***; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּקְפּוֺ‎</span> [[Esth.10.2|Esth 10:2]] the deeds ***of his power*** (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּבוּרָתוֺ‎</span>, etc.).
